original_text: And thou shalt make two cherubims of gold, of beaten work shalt thou make them, in the two ends of the mercy seat.
korean_text: 금으로 그룹 둘을 속죄소 두 끝에 쳐서 만들되

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make two cherubims of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 금으로 두 그룹을 만들 것이며

sentences.original_text: of beaten work shalt thou make them
in the two ends of the mercy seat
